NAME: Sudipro Ghosh
ABOUT:
The world is chaotic.

To make sense of it, I have always tried to model what I see into deterministic frameworks. Programming was a natural extension of that mindset and quickly became a part of who I am.

This has led me to interning at Microsoft and eventually getting an offer there. But learning more about programming remains my primary goal and thus I'm looking for an opportunity where I can continue learning.

I have experience in building distributed systems, real-time messaging systems and image processing.
